Module contents

Test package for gameplay module in Worderly.

This package contains unit tests for the core gameplay logic, state management, powerup handling, and gameplay constants.

Modules:

test_gameplay: Tests for the main gameplay loop and related utilities. test_game_state_handler: Tests for functions and classes managing game state and statistics. test_powerup_handler: Tests for logic handling powerups and their effects.
